title: Apps are not auto-updating, is anyone facing the same issue?
content: I have tried clearing cache and storage of play store and play services, nothing works, auto-updates are on in setting over any network this is a brand new phone, this seems to be a common problem amongst Pixel phones, why is google not acknowledging this issue?  I had to manually update my apps, i never faced such an issue on my Samsung phone ðŸ˜¥
